name: Crypt Shyfter: Turbo Wars
description: Not all soldiers live long and happy lives, especially in space. But death doesn't necessarily mean the end of service. With advancements in modern medicine and technology, it's possible to keep fighting the good fight long after your expiration date. Borgs are machine shells containing the remains of a soldier after they're KIA. If there's a will, there's a way... or so they say.
